meanings.definition: Formed or shaped after an event or action has taken place.
meanings.sent1: The postformed sculpture captured the essence of the moment.
meanings.sent2: The postformed cake was decorated beautifully after the party.
meanings.sent3: The postformed painting seemed to come alive with each brushstroke.
meanings.sent4: Her postformed smile revealed the joy she felt inside.
meanings.sent5: The postformed clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.definition: Created or designed in a specific way, typically following a set pattern or process.
meanings.sent1: The postformed table fit perfectly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The postformed countertops were sleek and modern in design.
meanings.sent3: The postformed puzzle pieces clicked together effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: His postformed routine made his day more organized.
meanings.sent5: The postformed garden followed a symmetrical layout with precision.
